bio: The leader of the Woolly Grumpers. His constant griping makes him monumentally unpopular.

soultimate.name: Awkward Moment
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Drops foe's Attack by 50% for 30 seconds.
soultimate.description: Foes' attack is greatly decreased for a time.

skill.effect: Atk ↑ when attacked, 2% ↑ per hit, lasts till death.
skill.name: That All You Got?

name: Groupus Khan
